ModDescription: Allows fine-grained control over the temperatures, and seasons, on the server.
Features.NeverWinter.ServerCommand.OnDis: Allows fine-grained control over the temperatures, and seasons, on the server.
Features.NeverWinter.ServerCommand.OnHib: Allow time to pass when no-one is online, within a range of months.
Features.NeverWinter.ServerCommand.OnMin: Ensure the server temperature will never go under this limit.
Features.NeverWinter.ServerCommand.OnMax: Ensure the server temperature will never go over this limit.
Features.NeverWinter.ServerCommand.OnOve: Force the season to be spring, summer, autumn, or winter, all year round.
Features.NeverWinter.ServerCommand.OnExc: Exclude a season; spring, summer, autumn, or winter, from the annual cycle.
Features.NeverWinter.ServerCommand.OnRes: Reset the mod back to factory settings.
